name: 乾
summary: A space with strong outward drive and upward momentum.
homeImpact: This environment pushes the person to stay active, decisive and externally focused. It sharpens ambition but may reduce sensitivity to subtle emotional signals.
usage: For your chosen intention, the space amplifies initiative. It accelerates action but may feel intense for slower or reflective activities.

name: 夬
